name: CreateNewJob
description:
Create a new job listing with specified details.

Use this tool to create a new job listing. It requires permission to write jobs and can be used in conjunction with the custom fields setting tool to add additional job details.

parameters.name: job_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details like job title, team ID, location ID, interview plan ID, job template ID, and brand ID.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
